00024 class HttpRequest
00025 {
00026     friend class HttpSocket;
00027     friend class HttpServer;
00028 
00029     public:
00030         // Defines available types of the request method.
00031         enum HttpRequestMethodType {
00032             c_http_request_method_get,
00033             c_http_request_method_post
00034         };
00035 
00036         // Defines one parameter name and value.
00037         typedef struct {
00038             String name;
00039             String value;
00040         } ParamPair;
00041         // Defines a list of parameters.
00042         typedef Vector<ParamPair> ParamPairList;
00043 
00048         HttpRequest(HttpRequestMethodType type = c_http_request_method_get);
00049 
00054         HttpRequestMethodType GetRequestMethodType();
00055 
00060         String GetRequestTarget();
00061

00067 
00072         String GetHttpVersion();
00073

00085

00089 
00090     protected:
00095         void SetBody(RamDataSinkPtr newBody);
00096 
00097         
00098         HttpRequestMethodType m_requestMethod;  // the request method
00099         String m_requestTarget; // the request target
00100         Vector<ParamPair> m_requestParams;  // the request parameters
00101         String m_httpVersion;   // the HTTP version
00102         HttpRequestHeaders m_headers;   // vector of received request headers
00103         RamDataSinkPtr m_body;  // (optionally) received body data
00104 };
